title: [和理非入] 一齊炸爆聯合國秘書長email

replies.msg:
今晚過人權法...要快D make noise. 等左成朝都無人出....頂硬上...英文差...不好意思....

何超瓊去信聯合國狂數示威者「暴行」
不如去信聯合國秘書長 Secretary-General
António Guterres
Email: antonio.guterres@un.org
CC: hrcpresidency@un.org (Coly Seck, The Human Rights Council)
Telephone +1 212 963 5012 (Direct)
Twitter account http://bit.ly/2svQFXv
BCC: 其他成員?
爆佢地個郵箱, 何超瓊封信內容唔洗逐點駁. 以下是template
----------------------------

9th September 2019

Dear Secretary-General,

Referring to the written statement submitted by the Hong Kong Federation of Women (HKFW), titled "On the true situation of Hong Kong, China". It claims to represent the view of 100,000 women members and provides a fact-based perspective on the recent social movement. Two responses are given here.

About the managing structure of HKFW, please notice that the wives of the all previous HKSAR Chief Executives, are Life Patron; while Carrie Lam, the present HKSAR Chief Executive, is the present Honorary Patron. The stand of HKFW is undeniably pro-government.

It is also shocking that the statement asserted the Extradition bill as "well-intended". The "true situation" is, on the 18th of August, 2,000,000 Hong Kongers marched on the street to protest against it. If 2 million people can not represent the views of all 7.5 million Hong Kongers, how can an organization with just 100,000 members represent Hong Kongers to make noise in the Human Rights Council?

It is indeed HKFW who hijacks the well-intended movement and stigmatizes it. It is the government who spread white terror with brutal violence exercised by the police force. I hereby urge the UN Human Rights Council to invite more stakeholders from Hong Kong to reveal the "true situation".

Best regards,

A Hong Konger.

建議唔好一味用template
就算用都要改標題、下款

人地聯合國秘書長呀
